page.title: 08BOSTON W.WHERE WERE YOU BORN
page.content: The{question}asked of the{parents}was {"Where were you and your children {born?}"The answers were filled in on a simple form.We included both parents and 1-5 children.No family had 5 children and only 4 families had 4 children.105 forms were returned and the results were as follows- AREA PARENTS CHILDREN BOSTON&DISTRICT 93 200 LINCOLNSHIRE 35 22 EAST MIDLANDS 14 08 REST OF ENGLAND 54 36 WALES 05 01 SCOTLAND 05 00 N.IRELAND 01 00 IRELAND 00 00 EUROPE 01 00 REST OF WORLD 02 01 Not all of the children are of school age at present
